title: SutoPuri Movie: Hajimari no Monogatari - Strawberry School Festival!!!

alternative_titles.ja: 劇場版すとぷり はじまりの物語~Strawberry School Festival!!!~

synopsis:
Get ready to be swept away by the dazzling idol unit, Strawberry Prince! With over 8 billion YouTube views, millions of followers, and sold-out dome tours, these six stars—Rinu, Root, Colon, Satomi, Jel, and Nanamori—are unstoppable. From the NHK Red and White song battle to record-breaking tours, their rise is legendary. Discover the sweet beginnings of Japan’s most beloved idols.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
